name: Band Room
description:
Band Room is a mobile game that you can make music with your friends online and real time. Features:
  • You can make music online and realtime up to 4 players
  • 4 Different Virual Insturments(Guitar,Drums,Bass,Piano)
  • 2 Different Guitar sounds(Clean and Distortion)
  • 2 Different Play Style For Guitar and Bass (Crazy and Normal)
  • You can bend the string on the guitar
  • You can customize your guitar sound with ampflier settings
  • You can record your music and share it
